The four principles (Tim Berners Lee, 2006)
1.
Use URIs as names 
for things 
2.
Use HTTP URIs so

esignIssues/Linked
Data.html
that people can look 
up those names. 
3.
When someone looks 
up a URI, provide 
useful information, 
using the standards 
Data.html

(RDF*, SPARQL) 
4.
Include links to other 
URIs, so that they can 
discover more things.
